mapper.select: SELECT education, area, branch, subject, mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat, sun, time, price, cname, cart_no FROM basket INNER JOIN course ON basket.course_no = course.course_no WHERE member_no = #{no}

SELECT m.member_no, i_cname, i_startday, i_endday, (SELECT teacher_img_org FROM course WHERE course.course_no = pd.course_no) as teacher_img FROM member m JOIN pay p ON m.member_no = p.member_no JOIN pay_detail pd ON p.order_no = pd.order_no WHERE m.member_no = #{member_no} AND STR_TO_DATE(i_startday, '%Y-%m-%d') <= CURDATE() AND STR_TO_DATE(i_endday, '%Y-%m-%d') > CURDATE() ORDER BY i_startday

SELECT m.member_no, pay_date, p.order_no, i_cname, i_price, i_startday, i_endday, (select teacher_img_org from course where course.course_no = pd.course_no) as teacher_img FROM member m JOIN pay p ON m.member_no = p.member_no JOIN pay_detail pd ON p.order_no = pd.order_no WHERE m.member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY i_endday desc
SELECT c.cname, cq_title, cq_writedate FROM member m JOIN cqna cq ON m.member_no = cq.member_no JOIN course c ON c.course_no = cq.course_no WHERE m.member_no = 13 ORDER BY cq_writedate;

SELECT c.cname, r.r_title, r.r_writedate FROM member m JOIN review r ON m.member_no = r.member_no JOIN course c ON c.course_no = r.course_no WHERE m.member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY r.r_writedate desc
